      • uploadClob

        void uploadClob(java.lang.String tableName,
                java.lang.String dataFieldName,
                java.lang.String whereClause,
                java.io.Reader reader)
        Parameters:
        tableName -
        dataFieldName - field in the table which to upload object data to
        whereClause - must select a single row from the table, which to upload object data to
        reader - object data source. Passing null to erase the existing content is discouraged (may cause exceptions), use deleteClob(String, String, String)
        Throws:
        RuntimeSQLException - в случае SQLException
        java.lang.RuntimeException - в случае любого другого исключения

      • deleteBlob

        void deleteBlob(java.lang.String tableName,

        whereClause -
        Throws:

      • uploadBlob

        void uploadBlob(java.lang.String tableName,
                java.lang.String dataFieldName,
                java.lang.String whereClause,
                java.io.InputStream stream)
        Parameters:
        tableName -
        dataFieldName - field in the table which to upload object data to
        whereClause - must select a single row from the table, which to upload object data to
        stream - object data source. Passing null to erase the existing content is discouraged (may cause exceptions), use deleteBlob(String, String, String)
        Throws:
        RuntimeSQLException - в случае SQLException
        java.lang.RuntimeException - в случае любого другого исключения

      • uploadClob

        default void uploadClob(java.lang.String tableName,
                        java.lang.String dataFieldName,
                        java.lang.String whereClause,
                        java.lang.String content)
        Parameters:
        tableName -
        dataFieldName -
        whereClause -
        content - object data. Passing null (as well as passing "") erases the existing content
        Throws:
        RuntimeSQLException - в случае SQLException
        java.lang.RuntimeException - в случае любого другого исключения

      • uploadClob

        default void uploadClob(java.lang.String tableName,
                        java.lang.String dataFieldName,
                        java.lang.String whereClause,
                        java.io.InputStream stream,
                        java.lang.String charset)
        Parameters:
        tableName -
        dataFieldName -
        whereClause -
        stream - object data source. Passing null to erase the existing content is discouraged (may cause exceptions), use deleteClob(String, String, String)
        charset -
        Throws:
        RuntimeSQLException - в случае SQLException
        java.lang.RuntimeException - в случае любого другого исключения

      • downloadClob

        void downloadClob(java.lang.String tableName,
                  java.lang.String dataFieldName,
                  java.lang.String whereClause,
                  java.io.Writer writer)
        Parameters:
        tableName -
        dataFieldName - field in the table which to upload object data to
        whereClause - must select a single row from the table, which to download object data from
        writer - object data target. If the object is null (as well as empty) in the database, no data will be written
        Throws:
        RuntimeSQLException - в случае SQLException
        java.lang.RuntimeException - в случае любого другого исключения

      • downloadBlob

        void downloadBlob(java.lang.String tableName,
                  java.lang.String dataFieldName,
                  java.lang.String whereClause,
                  java.io.OutputStream stream)
        Parameters:
        tableName -
        dataFieldName - field in the table which to upload object data to
        whereClause - must select a single row from the table, download object data from
        stream - object data target
        Throws:
        RuntimeSQLException - в случае SQLException
        java.lang.RuntimeException - в случае любого другого исключения

      • downloadClob

        default java.lang.String downloadClob(java.lang.String tableName,
                                      java.lang.String dataFieldName,
                                      java.lang.String whereClause)
        Parameters:
        tableName -
        dataFieldName -
        whereClause -
        Returns:
        either non-empty string containing object data or null if the object is null (as well as empty) in the database
        Throws:
        RuntimeSQLException - в случае SQLException
        java.lang.RuntimeException - в случае любого другого исключения
